attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Christians are suffering around the world and world leaders do nothing about it.

They turn their backs on muslim converts to christianity who suffer the death penatly. WE NEED FREEDOM OF FAITH IN ALL COUNTRIES AROUND THE WORLD

EVEN CHILDREN UNDER SHARIA LAW ARE BEING KILLED.

IN SUPPORT OF REALSE

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
